data: Michael Thompson is Chief Operations Officer at Enterprise Ltd
Michael Thompson has over 20 years of experience in supply chain and operations management
Michael Thompson is located in New York, NY, US
Michael Thompson holds certifications in PMP and Supply Chain Professional
Michael Thompson implemented Lean Six Sigma practices that reduced costs by 15%
Michael Thompson has expertise in Operations Management, Process Improvement, Lean Six Sigma, and Strategic Planning
Michael Thompson has a quarterly check-in scheduled and has discussed a potential partnership
